title: Fluffy Pancakes
steps: In a large bowl, whisk together flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt.
In another bowl, beat the egg, then add milk and melted butter.
Pour wet ingredients into dry ingredients and stir until just combined.
Heat a griddle over medium heat and pour 1/4 cup batter for each pancake.
Cook until bubbles form on the surface, then flip and cook until golden brown.

title: Homemade Pizza
steps: Dissolve yeast in warm water and let stand for 5 minutes.
Mix flour, salt, and sugar in a large bowl. Add yeast mixture and olive oil.
Knead dough for 7-10 minutes until smooth and elastic.
Let dough rise in a greased bowl for 1 hour.
Preheat oven to 475°F (245°C).
Roll out dough and add sauce, cheese, and toppings.
Bake for 12-15 minutes until crust is golden.

title: Creamy Garlic Pasta
steps: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions. Reserve 1/2 cup pasta water.
In a pan, melt butter and sauté garlic for 1 minute.
Add cream and simmer for 2-3 minutes.
Stir in Parmesan until melted.
Add cooked pasta and toss to coat. Add reserved water if needed.
Season with salt, pepper, and garnish with parsley.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
steps: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
Cream together butter and sugars until light and fluffy.
Add eggs and vanilla, mix well.
Combine flour, baking soda, and salt. Gradually add to wet ingredients.
Stir in chocolate chips.
Scoop onto baking sheet and bake for 10-12 minutes until golden edges appear.
Cool on a rack before serving.
